resources.string: Mission: Ensure maximum yield with real-time agricultural resources during pre-harvest and ensure balance market with scientific use of ICT for rural farmers.
An effort towards scientific practice in Agriculture in Nepal.
Copyright 2014 ICT For Agriculture. All rights reserved

This apps provides the major crop and animal disease information and its medical solution. It provides the fertilizer requirement in different plants. This also provides best price rate offered by different traders and expected by different farmers for agro products. Similarly it provides 14 days weather forcast of major cities of Nepal to help farmers decide farming process.
To get agricultural info and market info via SMS in ordinary mobile phone, farmers and traders need to be registered which is done by Data Facilitator.
For detail information of IFA project, please visit www.ict4agri.com
